<template>
    {{ CHECKED_TASK }}
    <button @click="closeTask">Закрыть</button>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters, mapMutations } from 'vuex'
export default {
    computed: {
    ...mapGetters(['CHECKED_TASK']), 
  },
    data(){
        return {

        }
    }, 
    methods: {
        ...mapMutations(['UPDATE_CHECKED_TASK'])
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
